body_en: "Denazification" is a term [used](https://www.dw.com/en/fact-check-do-vladimir-putins-justifications-for-going-to-war-against-ukraine-add-up/a-60917168) by Putin as one of the goals of the "special military operation" during a speech where he announced the start of the "special operation".
name: mythical-nazis-10-DefaultText
